attributes.action: Get parliament to sit until a brexit deal has been sorted out
attributes.additional_details:
3 years worth of parliamentary jabberwocky and billions of finite pounds from the public purse.

Brexit is no further forward now than what it was 3 years ago
attributes.background:
3 years is an eternity in politics, brexit should have been done and dusted by  now.

3 years ago article 50 was triggered by parliament for brexit.  If parliament closes for scheduled summer recess brexit will not be possible by October 31 2019
